short_description: Evaluate the sentiment extraction SQL/MR function.
long_description: Evaluate the sentiment extraction SQL/MR function, by comapring the RESULT_COLUMN and RESULT_COLUMN.The value of EXPECT_COLUMN and RESULT_COLUMN should be 'pos' represent positive,'neg' represent negative and 'neu' represent neutral

input_tables.name: input
input_tables.rDescription: The input table should contain a text column which contains input text.
input_tables.description: The input table should contain a text column which contains input text.

argument_clauses.name: ObsColumn
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the name of the input column with the observed sentiment (POS, NEG or NEU).
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the name of the input column with the observed sentiment (POS, NEG or NEU).

argument_clauses.name: SentimentColumn
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the name of the input column with the predicted sentiment (POS, NEG or NEU).
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the name of the input column with the predicted sentiment (POS, NEG or NEU).
